markdownRemark.html:
Steps:

This guide is intended for readers unfamiliar with the technologies involved.

  • Sign up for AWS (Amazon Web Services) account For this Project we will be using AWS as our cloud provider, the project is scoped for AWS Free Usage Tier, so if you are new to AWS your cloud cost should be minimal.

    • Sign up here

  • Register Domain Name from AWS - Route 53 We will be using Route 53 for registering our domain name and for handling our DNS.

frontmatter.title: How to start your own scooter share
